name: Achievement Hunter (Demo)
description:
Hello everyone, 

Thank you all for checking out this project. This is our first game and I would like to say that it is in no way at all close to being done. I would love feedback but I am still working hard on this project and this is just a cool demo. Right now it is just a standard platformer but I will add more mechanics (like the achievements) at a later date.

Credits:

I just wanted to say two things: 1.) This music is not mine. It is CC0 Music. 2.) When I sourced the music, I kept a credits doc. This doc did not save. I have done my best to recreate the list but some names could be wrong or missing. I am sorry.

ALL MUSIC AND SOUNDS FROM OPENGAMEART.ORG

Music:

tapatilorenzo

Brandon Morris

celestialghost8

Alex McCulloch

Ville Nousiainen

Sound Effects:

wobbleboxx / wobbleboxx.com

Fupi

Future Ideas:

- More Levels!

- Credit video

- Story

- Adding the achievement system

- Multiplayer Support
